Amid Auckland’s devastating 2023 storms, drug addict Dylan Hendriks saw opportunity to steal, destroy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/amid-aucklands-devastating-2023-storms-drug-addict-dylan-hendriks-saw-opportunity-to-steal-destroy/XNDQOGCPO5GQLPUKB27IMHEZIA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/amid-aucklands-devastating-2023-storms-drug-addict-dylan-hendriks-saw-opportunity-to-steal-destroy/XNDQOGCPO5GQLPUKB27IMHEZIA/ Craig KapitanHe also endangered an Air NZ flight. Sat, 06 Apr 2024 01:00:00 +0000 Dylan Hendriks has been sentenced to prison for the burglary of an under-construction New Lynn housing development during Cyclone Gabrielle, as well as for pointing a high-powered laser at an Air New Zealand flight and myriad other offences.

Duncan Garner: Celebrating seven years clean by going bushhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-listener/opinion/duncan-garner-celebating-seven-years-clean-by-going-bush/O3AAWLIO3RCWXKVMMBL3ANBCVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-listener/opinion/duncan-garner-celebating-seven-years-clean-by-going-bush/O3AAWLIO3RCWXKVMMBL3ANBCVQ/ I didn't miss my phone, it was 2 weeks away from a constant barrage of digital noise. Fri, 05 Apr 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Duncan Garner: "Going offline gave me a lot of down time to think, contemplate and conclude, once again, that we’ve got it wrong. My two-week tap-out confirmed to me that our society is designed around a mad rat race." Photo / Tony Nyberg
